transcripts.text: Good to see you.  Thank you.  Got to be honest, I'm worried about these people blowing whistles all night long.  I don't know what's going to happen.

Because, you know, the day the story broke about the whistleblower, I wrote a column that said.  I wrote a column that said the whistleblower is not a whistleblower.  He's not a whistleblower under the law.  If you read the law, you have to be blowing the whistle at intelligence activity, which this wasn't.  And you have to blow the whistle on somebody in the intelligence community.  Well, the president's not in the intelligence community.  They report to him.

This new book called Witch Hunt, what you talk about is that the origin of this is was not just some people who love their country and trying to make sure it was okay.  These were people on a mission, a mission to destroy an elected president.  I mean, is that a fair assessment?  Has that really happened?

Yeah, no, they wanted to, first they wanted to stop him from becoming president.  Then once he was unexpectedly elected, they wanted to drive him from office and undo the election results.  And people always ask, well, why would they do this?
Let's talk about who they are.
They are, you know, a lot of people call them the deep state.  I call it a malignant force.  That's how I open the book.  These are people.

Thank you.  These are people in the intelligence community, the FBI, the Department of Justice, the State Department.  They are people of like mind.  They are all addicted to power.  Trump was a threat to them because he promised to drain the swamp.  The swamp didn't want to be drained.  Powering Washington is like crack cocaine.  I mean, once you start, you don't want to stop.  You don't want to give it up.  You'll do anything to make sure that it keeps going.

Greg, there are thousands of people in the intelligence community and in law enforcement, Department of Justice, FBI.  What percentage are the bad guys?  Because I don't want to disparage all of those people.  There are some fantastic public servants, people who have sacrificed really their entire lives to serve this country.  So, you know, I know we're not talking about everyone in the intel community, not everyone in the FBI or Justice Department.  What would be your guess of the percentage of people that we ought to be worried about that have really stepped across the line and threatened this republic of ours?

It's a small cabal at the top of, at the time, the FBI, James Comey, Andrew McCabe, Peter Strzok, Lisa Page, others as well.  with a like-minded cabal at the CIA headed by John Brennan and the Director of National Intelligence, James Clapper.  I mean, I name names in the book, and I go through in meticulous detail their malicious, insidious acts, their insipid lies and deceptions, and the corruption that was so endemic in their administration of their agencies.

Adam Schiff for over two years said, we have the evidence.  And he kept talking about that.  he had the evidence.  And then the Mueller report came out and he found out he didn't have anything.  So when he says now
